--- title: priceHist keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Parse historical stock price data files." description: "Parse historical stock price data files." nb_path: "14_priceHist.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Uses the historical price data from eoddata.com - this comes as one CSV file per exchange per day, sample:

Symbol,Date,Open,High,Low,Close,Volume
AACG,08-Jan-2020,1.41,1.58,1.3642,1.5112,90800
AAL,08-Jan-2020,27.1,28.09,27.07,27.84,10497200
...
{% raw %}

getHistFStuff[source]

getHistFStuff(exch, dateStr)

Returns (fName, fDir, fPath) containing the CSV file of historical prices for the given exchange and date.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
t = getHistFStuff('NASDAQ','20240510')
assert (t[0]=='NASDAQ_20240510.csv'
        and t[1]==os.path.join(utils.stockPriceRoot,'NASDAQ_2024')
        and t[2]==os.path.join(utils.stockPriceRoot,'NASDAQ_2024',t[0]))
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

getDayMap[source]

getDayMap(dateStr, exch, symCol='Symbol', priceCol='Close')

Parse the CSV file for a single day and exchange, returning a dict: ->

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
utils.setStockPriceRoot('testdata')

m = getDayMap('20200108','AMEX')
assert (len(m)==2024
        and min(m.keys())=='AAAU' and m['AAAU']==15.56
        and max(m.keys())=='ZSL' and m['ZSL']==26.04)

m = getDayMap('20200108','NASDAQ')
assert (len(m)==3233
        and min(m.keys())=='AACG' and m['AACG']==1.5112
        and max(m.keys())=='ZYXI' and m['ZYXI']==8.47)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

getCombDayMap[source]

getCombDayMap(dateStr, exchs=['AMEX', 'NASDAQ', 'NYSE', 'OTCBB'], checkDups=True, symCol='Symbol', priceCol='Close')

Combines the day maps for a list of exchanges, optionally checking for symbols
duplicated between exchanges.

getDayMap arguments: symCol='Symbol', priceCol='Close'

Parse the CSV file for a single day and exchange,
returning a dict:<stock symbol> -> <value>
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
m = getCombDayMap('20200108',['AMEX','NASDAQ'])
assert len(m)==2024+3233
{% endraw %}
